chatbot.title: Health Assistant
chatbot.subtitle: Get answers to your health-related questions
chatbot.disclaimer: This is an AI assistant. For medical emergencies, please contact your doctor or call emergency services.
chatbot.welcome:
Hello! I'm your healthcare assistant. I can help you with:

• Disease-related queries
• General health guidance
• Understanding prescriptions or reports

How can I assist you today?

responses.default: Thank you for your question. While I can provide general health information, please consult with your doctor for personalized medical advice. Is there anything specific I can help you understand about your health?
responses.headache: Headaches can be caused by various factors including stress, dehydration, lack of sleep, or eye strain. For relief, try resting in a dark room, staying hydrated, and taking over-the-counter pain relievers if appropriate. If headaches persist or are severe, please consult your doctor.
responses.prescription: I can help you understand your prescriptions! To get information about a specific medication, please share the name of the medicine, and I'll provide details about its usage, dosage guidelines, and potential side effects.
responses.appointment: To book an appointment, please visit the Appointments section in your dashboard. You can choose your preferred doctor, date, and time slot. Would you like me to guide you through the process?
